comm.data

Class BluetoothDataCenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • comm.data.BluetoothDataCenter

  • public final class BluetoothDataCenter
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to provide a centralized, synchronized location to store the data collected by the bluetooth communication with the robot.
    Author:
    Andrei Purcarus
